summary: SuiteCRM Improper Control of Filename for Include Statement in PHP and Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous content leads to authenticated remote code execution
details: SuiteCRM is an open-source Customer Relationship Management (CRM) software application. Prior to versions 7.14.4 and 8.6.1, a vulnerability in uploaded file verification in products allows for remote code execution. Versions 7.14.4 and 8.6.1 contain a fix for this issue.
